name: Slice Em - Arcade Slicing Game
description:
Slice the falling shapes to as many pieces as you can!
You get a point for every piece reaching the bottom of the screen.

Use powerups like lasers and bombs and earn extra points with combos and streaks.
Avoid teleporters, shrinkers and gravity multipliers.
That’s all you need to know to get started!

*** Supports Game Center LeaderBoards ***
